Uses of Class
events.RandomEvent

Packages that use RandomEvent 
Package Description
events
Contains all the random events
gui
Contains all the GUI classes and modules
islands
Contains all the islands and island-associated classes (like Route)
main
Core package - Contains all the important classes that can't be categorized

  • Uses of RandomEvent in events

    Subclasses of RandomEvent in events 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PirateAttack
    Random event representing a pirate attack.
    class  Rescue
    A random event representing rescuing sailors.
    class  Weather
    Random event representing poor weather.
    Methods in events that return RandomEvent 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static RandomEvent[] RandomEvent.getEvents​(java.lang.String[] risks)
    Gets an array of random events from the given preset.
    {low, medium, high, none}

  • Uses of RandomEvent in gui

    Methods in gui with parameters of type RandomEvent 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void Sailing.processEvent​(RandomEvent event)
    Handles the currently drawn random event

  • Uses of RandomEvent in islands

    Methods in islands that return RandomEvent 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RandomEvent[] Route.getRandomEvents()
    Generates a list of random events given this route's risk

  • Uses of RandomEvent in main

    Methods in main that return RandomEvent 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RandomEvent GameEnvironment.passDay()
    Pass a day on the open ocean, paying crew wages and checking for random events
